Cake.title: Cake Baking Competition!!
Cake.description: Cake Baking Competion will take place at the Main lobby of Little Bakery. Contstants should report 1 hour before the beginning of the competition.Competition will start at 6pm, Tuesday

Shake.title: Shake Baking Competition!!
Shake.description: Shake making Competion will take place at the Main lobby of Little Bakery. Contstants should report 1 hour before the beginning of the competition.Competition will start at 8pm, Tuesday
